fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may decide to skin them. If they die, they will appear as the Butcher, and they will use your Last Will instead of their own. You can also change their cause of death to any other killing role.
-Otherwise, you may decide to clean them, obscuring their role, last will and cause of death.
-You may only clean twice.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone who would oppose you.
